methods.name: public Builder setTaskFragmentCreationParams(@Nullable TaskFragmentCreationParams taskFragmentCreationParams)
methods.comment: * Sets the {@link TaskFragmentCreationParams} for creating a new TaskFragment.

methods.name: public Builder setActivityToken(@Nullable IBinder activityToken)
methods.comment: * Sets an Activity token to this operation.

methods.name: public Builder setActivityIntent(@Nullable Intent activityIntent)
methods.comment: * Sets the Intent to start a new Activity.

methods.name: public Builder setBundle(@Nullable Bundle bundle)
methods.comment: * Sets a Bundle to this operation.

methods.name: public Builder setSecondaryFragmentToken(@Nullable IBinder secondaryFragmentToken)
methods.comment: * Sets the secondary fragment token to this operation.

methods.name: public Builder setAnimationParams(@Nullable TaskFragmentAnimationParams animationParams)
methods.comment: * Sets the {@link TaskFragmentAnimationParams} for the given TaskFragment.

methods.name: public Builder setBooleanValue(boolean booleanValue)
methods.comment: * Sets the boolean value for this operation.

methods.name: public Builder setSurfaceTransaction(@Nullable SurfaceControl.Transaction surfaceTransaction)
methods.comment:
* Sets {@link SurfaceControl.Transaction} associated with this operation. Currently, this
         * is only used by {@link TaskFragmentOperation#OP_TYPE_SET_DECOR_SURFACE_BOOSTED} to
         * specify a {@link SurfaceControl.Transaction} that should be applied together with the
         * transaction to change the decor surface layers.
